text: Brian Galach (born 16 May 2001) is a Polish professional footballer who plays for Crawley Town, as a striker. ==Early and personal life== Galach was born in Poland, and attended Chingford Foundation School. ==Club career== After spending time with Leyton Orient (who he joined at under-9 level) and Aldershot Town, Galach signed for Crawley Town in June 2018. On 4 September 2018, Galach made his Crawley debut during their EFL Trophy group-stage tie against Tottenham Hotspur U23s. On 17 November 2018, Galach joined Isthmian League side, Burgess Hill Town on a short-term loan. On 3 January 2020, Galach joined Billericay Town on a one-month loan. On 4 February 2020, his loan was extended to the end of February. ==International career== In October 2015, Galach was called up to a training camp by the Poland under-15 national team. ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|FA Cup !colspan="2"|League Cup !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="4"|Crawley Town |2018–19 |League Two |1||0||0||0||0||0||2||0||3||0 |- |2019–20 |League Two |0||0||0||0||0||0||2||0||2||0 |- |2020–21 |League Two |0||0||0||0||1||0||1||0||2||0 |- !colspan="2"|Total !1!!0!!0!!0!!1!!0!!5!!0!!7!!0 |- |Burgess Hill Town (loan) |2018–19 |Isthmian League Premier Division |5||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||1||1||6||1 |- |Billericay Town (loan) |2019–20 |National League South |5||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||1||0||6||0 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !11!!0!!0!!0!!1!!0!!7!!1!!19!!1 |} ==References== Category:2001 births Category:Living people Category:Polish footballers Category:Leyton Orient F.C. players Category:Aldershot Town F.C. players Category:Crawley Town F.C. players Category:Burgess Hill Town F.C. players Category:Billericay Town F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Association football forwards Category:Polish expatriate footballers Category:Polish expatriates in England Category:Expatriate footballers in England Category:Poland youth international footballers
